name: places/ChIJi2cUkVtYwokRacRn61l0eP8
formattedAddress: 555 W 57th St, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 555 W 57th St, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: pushed from one office to another. completely confusing systems and rude admin staff (the actual drs are at a standard you would expect)... and then you receive an outlandish bill which they then put up ridiculous barriers so its hard to pay said bill. There's a website - it doesn't work. So there's a number you can call between 8-4pm Mon-thurs and then something else on Fridays. If I can reach zappos to fix my order for a pair of 70 shoes, I should get the same if not better service to pay my $2K+ bill. screw these guys they're the worst.

originalText.text: Tried calling all day in regards to medical records. Finally received the fax number after 4 and a half hours. Constantly was transferred and told to call a different number all day long. No one would answer or take me off hold. Was hung up on numerous times and when finally put through to explain the detour I was given, medical records was very rude and didn’t seem considerate at all. Highly unimpressed with the way they treat people on the phone.

originalText.text: The receptionist incredibly rude. I was trying to make an appointment, and it sounded like she wanted nothing to do with me. I then asked when the next available appointment is, there was about a minute of silence, so I asked are you still there and she yelled back at me how am i suppose to check if your bothering me, and then hung up on me. Highly recommend a different office.

originalText.text: The Corporate offices at Mount Sinai are great.

text.text: The Corporate offices at Mount Sinai are great.
